item.description:
We are planning on camping before the Sunday Twin Mountain hike. The camp is close to the trail head.

RSVP if you would like to join us. You are welcome to come too if you have other plans in the park or just planning on relaxing.

USFS campsite Haystack rd is on the same road as the North Twin trailhead. off Hwy 3 before the brown cabins.

We have our eye on sites 10 & 11

primitive style camping. $3.00 or annual parking sticker

40% Saturday night rain cancels rsvp if you camp rain or shine

If possible, we can secure 2 sites and have 1 dog friendly.

come early and help us claim it. Lots of flat trails to stroll on
item.name: N & S Twin Mountain Campout
